space.gui.application

Class GameApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.gui.application.GameApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientListener

    public class GameApplication
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientListener
    The GameApplication class is the main runtime of the game, holding the various game loops for the different sections of the game's flow.
    Author:
    Matt Graham 300211545
